description: ExtractRegionFromImage can be used to extract a specific region from a given image. The region can be specified via indices, label, or another domain image.

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: Path to the input image from which the region will be extracted.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: Path to the output image where the extracted region will be saved.

min_index.title: Minimum Index
min_index.description: Minimum index to define the starting point of the region.

max_index.title: Maximum Index
max_index.description: Maximum index to define the endpoint of the region.

label.title: Label
label.description: Label value to extract the region corresponding to the specified label.

domain_image.title: Domain Image
domain_image.description: Image defining the domain from which to extract the region.

label.title: Label
label.description: Label value used for the region extraction.

region_specification.title: Region Specification
region_specification.description: Specify the region to extract using indices, label, domain image, or label with label image.
